EmptyListException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.utils
The class EmptyListException is a form of Exception that is thrown if a list that may be used in a method execution it is empty even if it should not.

EnforceTrackChosenColorSimilarityControllerState - Class in it.polimi.se2018.controller
This is an implicit state that enforces the constraint on any following die move that the dice to be moved be of the same color of the die chosen from the track.
